{"step_by_step_thinking": "The inferior wall of the orbit is formed by several bones. To determine which bones are not part of the inferior wall, we need to understand the anatomy of the orbit. The ethmoid bone is not part of the inferior wall of the orbit, as it forms the medial wall.
